disease: Malignant neoplasm of connective and soft tissue of unspecified lower limb, including hip

symptoms.name: Pain
symptoms.pattern: May be present or absent; can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Swelling
symptoms.pattern: May be present or absent; can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Weakness
symptoms.pattern: May be present or absent; can range from mild to severe

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.pattern: May be present or absent; can range from mild to severe

vital_signs.heart_rate: May be elevated in some cases
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: May be elevated in some cases
vital_signs.blood_pressure: May be elevated or decreased depending on the extent of the disease

imaging_findings.X-ray: May show bone destruction or soft tissue mass
imaging_findings.CT scan: Can provide detailed images of the mass and surrounding tissues
imaging_findings.MRI: Can provide detailed images of the mass and surrounding tissues, including soft tissues
imaging_findings.PET scan: Can help to determine the extent of the disease and the presence of metastasis

required: Clinical findings suggestive of a soft tissue mass in the lower limb, including the hip
Imaging findings consistent with a malignant neoplasm
supportive: Histopathological examination confirming the diagnosis of malignancy
